data.name: Errors.Validation.ParametersEmpty
data.value: Please fill out all required fields.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DeviceId.Required
data.value: Device ID is required.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DeviceId.NoEdgeSpaces
data.value: Device ID must not start or end with spaces.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DeviceId.MaxLength
data.value: Device ID must be at most 64 characters.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DeviceId.InvalidCharacters
data.value: Device ID may only contain letters, digits, '_' or '-'.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DisplayName.NoEdgeSpaces
data.value: Display name must not start or end with spaces.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DisplayName.MinLength
data.value: Display name must be at least 2 characters.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DisplayName.MaxLength
data.value: Display name must be at most 64 characters.

data.name: Errors.Validation.DisplayName.InvalidCharacters
data.value: Display name contains invalid characters.

data.name: Errors.Validation.InvalidInput
data.value: Some inputs are invalid. Please check your entries.

data.name: Errors.Validation.AvatarColor.InvalidFormat
data.value: Avatar color must be hex #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB.

data.name: Errors.Auth.MissingSub
data.value: Authentication required.

data.value: User not found.

data.value: Invalid If-Match header.

data.name: Errors.Http.IfMatchMismatch
data.value: If-Match did not match the current resource version.

data.name: Errors.User.EmailInUse
data.value: Email address is already in use.

data.name: Errors.User.ExistsForDevice

data.value: Refresh token expired.

data.name: Errors.Auth.RefreshRevoked
data.value: Refresh token was revoked.

data.name: Errors.Auth.InvalidToken
data.value: Invalid or expired authentication token.

data.name: Errors.Auth.MissingPermission
data.value: You don't have permission to perform this action.

data.value: You are not a member of this room.

data.value: You have been banned from this room.

data.value: Room identifier is missing.
